name: Between Dimensions (KnifishGames)
description: The game is created with Smile Game Builder and takes part in the Summer 2022 JAM. This is an RPG game with toon-style characters, an elemental turn-based battling system and exploring gameplay. Vico got lost in the desert and found a tram. Just before he stepped on board, an old man stopped him saying the vehicle was a ghost tram. Then Vico appeared in a dark place where two hell messengers were about to catch him... When he woke up, he found these horrible things in his dream should have appeared in the real world...
